abstract: Nokia will revive its most famous misfire, the video game-cellphone hybrid, the N-Gage, as a multiplayer gaming service that will work on its popular line of smartphones.
snippet: Nokia will revive its most famous misfire, the video game-cellphone hybrid, the N-Gage, as a multiplayer gaming service that will work on its popular line of smartphones.
lead_paragraph: Apple had the Newton. Sony struck out with the Betamax. I.B.M. blew it with the PCJr.

headline.main: Play It Again, Nokia. For the 3rd Time.
headline.print_headline: Play It Again, Nokia. For the 3rd Time.

abstract: When YouTube pitched its new advertising format to me, it described the semitransparent ads it is overlaying on videos as “something that has not been available before.” It probably should have added: “on YouTube.”.
snippet: When YouTube pitched its new advertising format to me, it described the semitransparent ads it is overlaying on videos as “something that has not been available before.” It probably should have added: “on YouTube.”.
lead_paragraph: When YouTube pitched its new advertising format to me, it described the semitransparent ads it is overlaying on videos as “something that has not been available before.” It probably should have added: “on YouTube.”

headline.main: Testing a Format, in a Test of Firsts
